Text:
This is classic entertainment. And it still works for a laugh or two. Good on ya mate! 8-)

Technical note:
The quality is probably as good as it gets, DivX or XviD would be apreciated for the size though.
But I'm not sure what the rules says about that. Well I'll just have to get a new disk (again). 8-)
Just loooves those old cartoons. Thanks for puting them out here!  :o))))
